title: [$500] "Hidden" is shown when inviting a new email to a room

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

comments.body: Triggered auto assignment to @conorpendergrast (`Bug`), see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/14418 for more details.

### Bug0 Triage Checklist ([Main S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418))

- [ ] This "bug" occurs on a supported platform (ensure `Platforms` in OP are ✅)
- [ ] This bug is not a duplicate report (check [E/App issues](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues) and [#expensify-bugs](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM))
    - If it is, comment with a link to the original report, close the issue and add any novel details to the original issue instead
- [ ] This bug is reproducible using the reproduction steps in the OP. [S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418#:~:text=The%20bug%20is%20reproducible)
    - If the reproduction steps are clear and you're unable to reproduce the bug, check with the reporter and QA first, then close the issue.
    - If the reproduction steps aren't clear and you determine the correct steps, please update the OP.
- [ ] This issue is filled out as thoroughly and clearly as possible
    - Pay special attention to the title, results, platforms where the bug occurs, and if the bug happens on staging/production.
- [ ] I have reviewed and subscribed to the linked Slack conversation to ensure Slack/Github stay in sync
Triggered auto assignment to Contributor-plus team member for initial proposal review - @Ollyws (`External`)
@m-natarajan tried this and couldn't repro - can you take a video?

I think this is expected. It's updated correctly when that user is added to personalDetailsList
cc: @puneetlath
@conorpendergrast I'm gonna take this one if you don't mind.

> It's updated correctly when that user is added to personalDetailsList

I agree with this. The problem is in absence of account data in `personalDetailList`. I think the backend should return the account data in Onyx
I'm not sure how to reproduce it. Can you provide more steps to reproduce? Thanks
@puneetlath, @Ollyws Whoops! This issue is 2 days overdue. Let's get this updated quick!
📣 It's been a week! Do we have any satisfactory proposals yet? Do we need to adjust the bounty for this issue? 💸
@puneetlath, @Ollyws 6 days overdue. This is scarier than being forced to listen to Vogon poetry!
@puneetlath, @Ollyws 6 days overdue. This is scarier than being forced to listen to Vogon poetry!
📣 It's been a week! Do we have any satisfactory proposals yet? Do we need to adjust the bounty for this issue? 💸
This issue has not been updated in over ***14*** days. @puneetlath, @Ollyws eroding to ***Weekly*** issue.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 1.3.95.5 **Reproducible in staging?:** y **Reproducible in production?:** y **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** **Logs:** https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/4856 **Expensify/Expensify Issue URL:** **Issue reported by:** @quinthar **Slack conversation:** https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM/p1699162858170159 ## Action Performed: 1. Open ND and login 2. Create a room 3. Invite a new user by mentioning ## Expected Result: Invited email address is shown ## Actual Result: "Hidden" is shown ## Workaround: unknown ## Platforms: Which of our officially supported platforms is this issue occurring on? - [ ] Android: Native - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: Native - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos Add any screenshot/video evidence ![Screenshot (256)](https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/38435837/edc9262f-5a2a-4160-9781-31c2e193c07b) [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
